articles.title: Asteroid Ryugu discovery suggests where ingredients for life on Earth came from - HT Tech
articles.description: Two organic compounds essential for living organisms have been found in samples retrieved from the asteroid Ryugu, buttressing the notion that some ingredients crucial for the advent of life arrived on Earth aboard rocks from space billions of years ago.
articles.content: Two organic compounds essential for living organisms have been found in samples retrieved from the asteroid Ryugu, buttressing the notion that some ingredients crucial for the advent of life arrived … [+3777 chars]
